subtitle.subtitle: Uh, on second thought, that way.
I'm sure you all want to thank me personally
but really it's all in a day's work for--
Where'd you get it? I've been searching all over for that!
It was a prize inside a box of sumo smack cereal.
The fire was just a diversion
to cover up a jewelry store robbery.
The bad guys are getting away.

[sniffs] Knew I should have bought those
asbestos seat covers when I had the chance.
Sorry, grandpa. I can't help it.
Agh! Ten superheroes on that stupid watch
and you picked the one with the flaming butt?
Unless you punks want a permanent sunburn..
You punks picked the wrong day to be bad.
Wow. Time sure flies when you're having fun.
I-I've decided to let you guys off with a warning this time.
Now, I know y'all want to thank me, but--
Step aside, son. This isn't playtime.
Playtime? I'm the one who captured them.
It's not fair. I'm the hero.
Phew. Smells like a zoo in here.
I am still your landlord, remember?
Maybe not since your rent is six months past due.
All my funds go into my research.
Now, get out! You're disturbing me.
Hmm. Looks like you were disturbed
long before I got here, pal.
Listen, Doc. You and your furry friends are out on the street
unless you pony up the green.
You must be an animal lover.
What's that? You a member of the moose lodge or something? Ha-ha.
It creates and accelerates mutations at the genetic level.
I'm sorry. I can't hear you.
Sounds like you have a frog in your throat.
[laughing] Or is that the other way around?
All I need is a few lousy components to finish my work.
(male announcer on TV) So whatever your needs
you'll find them under one roof at the grand opening
I thought this store prided itself on wide selection.
But can we have a normal dinner for once?
You know, one that doesn't involve stir-fried tentacles?
Now where do you suppose they keep the sheep's bladders?
Got you. What are you doing?
Uh, looking for the gold sumo slammer card. Duh!
You're supposed to use your powers to help people
not find some stupid trading card.
Just what do you think you're doing, young lady?
It wasn't me. It was my doofus cousin.
Well, someone is going to have to pay for all this.
So, why are we buying all this cereal?
Well, we would have only had to buy the one that I found
the gold sumo slammer card in
if Gwen hadn't butted in with her big butt!
Hello, you were trashing the whole cereal aisle
just to find some stupid piece of cardboard.
Ben, now, I can appreciate how much this card means to you.
But don't you think you're getting a little obsessed?
I don't deserve a gold sumo slammer card.
I mean, it's not like I rescued a bunch of people
from a burning building or anything like that.
Whoa! Sumo slammer cards. A complete set!
Let's check out the pet department.
Please, tell me you aren't looking for our breakfast.
Hey, what do you think you're doing?
You are so lucky I can't go hero.
Get down off that giant frog..
Uh, we got a grab-and-dash in electronics.
Male, 5'6", riding on a giant frog or toad.
Trust me, you can't miss him.
Arise to your full potential, my pets.
What kind of pet food are they selling around here?
Behold the genius of Dr. Animo.
Nothing can stop me from getting what I deserve.
If you didn't go cereal-diving one of those heroes
could be saving us from becoming hamster chow!
I don't need to go hero to stop an overgrown fur ball.
Not even giant hamsters can mess with Ben Tennyson.
Young fool, you cannot stop me!
If there's anything I can do to repay you..
Well, now that you mention it..
Grandpa, I was finally gonna score
No time for that now, Ben.
We have a giant parrot to follow.
Ah, just like the good old days before I retired.
So exactly what kind of plumber were you, Grandpa?
Uh, yeah, a darn good one.
from being a giant hamster's chew toy.
And what do I get? Nothing. It's not fair.
Being a hero isn't about others knowing you did something good.
It's about you knowing you did something good.
Being a hero is it's own reward.
What? Were you reading the greeting cards at the Megamart?
was a promising researcher in veterinary science.

'twisted genetic experiments where he was mutating animals'

called the Verities award, he flipped out.

which has been long since lifeless.

but I need to claim the award

I believe you have something of mine.
